description: This file defines a competitor analysis agent setup using various tools and classes, including agent configuration, instructions, and a playground setup for a competitor analysis application.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Configuration for an AI agent with tools, model, and instructions.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: Model class representing an OpenAI chat model.

classes.name: Playground
classes.description: Class to set up and serve a collection of agents for an application.

classes.name: SqliteStorage
classes.description: Storage class for SQLite database integration.

classes.name: FirecrawlTools
classes.description: Tools for web crawling, scraping, and mapping.

classes.name: ReasoningTools
classes.description: Tools for reasoning and analysis within the agent.

methods.name: dedent
methods.description: Utility function to remove common leading whitespace from text.
